mapper.select: select yuangongxingming, sum(case when kaoqinleixing in ('正常') then 1 else 0 end) as 正常, sum(case when kaoqinleixing in ('早退') then 1 else 0 end) as 早退, sum(case when kaoqinleixing in ('迟到') then 1 else 0 end) as 迟到, sum(case when kaoqinleixing in ('补签') then 1 else 0 end) as 补签, sum(case when kaoqinleixing in ('请假') then 1 else 0 end) as 请假 from yuangongkaoqin 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} group by yuangongxingming
